# Variable DEFAULT_INTENT_MATCHER_CONFIG`Const`

DEFAULT_INTENT_MATCHER_CONFIG: [IntentMatcherConfig](/interfaces/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.IntentMatcherConfig) = ...

Default intent matcher configuration for intent recognition. Provides standard settings for intent matching with embedding and LLM-based approaches.
